casebody.data:
Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, and as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al., petitioners,
v.
REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al. No. 17-1268. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted limited to Question 2 presented by the petition.

Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
